result.eng: I don't like his talk. I don't like what he says.
result.ga: ní maith liom a chuid cainte
result.orig: Ní maith liom a chuid cainte
result.html: ní maith liom a chuid cainteI don't like his talk. I don't like what he says.
result.ponchtml: ní maiṫ liom a ċuid cainteI don't like his talk. I don't like what he says.

result.eng: Too much talk!
result.ga: an iomarca cainte
result.orig: An iomarca cainte
result.html: an iomarca cainteToo much talk!
result.ponchtml: an iomarca cainteToo much talk!

result.eng: I'll be talking to you again.
result.ga: beidh mé ag caint leat arís
result.orig: Beidh mé ag caint leat arís
result.html: beidh mé ag caint leat arísI'll be talking to you again.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ mé ag caint leat arísI'll be talking to you again.

result.eng: His talk was a little obscure.
result.ga: bhí a chuid cainte rud beag doiléir
result.orig: Bhí a chuid cainte rud beag doiléir
result.html: bhí a chuid cainte rud beag doiléirHis talk was a little obscure.
result.ponchtml: ḃí a ċuid cainte rud beag doiléirHis talk was a little obscure.

result.eng: They were talking about me.
result.ga: bhí siad ag caint fúmsa
result.orig: Bhí siad ag caint fúmsa
result.html: bhí siad ag caint fúmsaThey were talking about me.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad ag caint fúmsaThey were talking about me.

result.eng: Were you listening to the President's speech?
result.ga: an raibh tú ag éisteacht le caint an uachtaráin
result.orig: An raibh tú ag éisteacht le caint an Uachtaráin
result.html: an raibh tú ag éisteacht le caint an uachtaráinWere you listening to the President's speech?
result.ponchtml: an raiḃ tú ag éisteaċt le caint an uaċtaráinWere you listening to the President's speech?

result.eng: You'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ga: cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.orig: Cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oíche
result.html: cheapfá óna gcuid cainte go raibh siad ag bualadh craicinn gach oícheYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.
result.ponchtml: ċeapfá óna gcuid cainte go raiḃ siad ag bualaḋ craicinn gaċ oíċeYou'd think from their talk that they had sex every night.

result.eng: The teacher made the students talk.
result.ga: chuir an múinteoir na daltaí ag caint
result.orig: Chuir an múinteoir na daltaí ag caint
result.html: chuir an múinteoir na daltaí ag caintThe teacher made the students talk.
result.ponchtml: ċuir an múinteoir na daltaí ag caintThe teacher made the students talk.

result.eng: The example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.
result.ga: cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha
result.orig: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha
result.html: cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrthaThe example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.
result.ponchtml: cuideoiḋ na habairtí samplaċa leat na focail a ḟí isteaċ i do ċuid cainte go nádúrṫaThe example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.

result.eng: He lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.
result.ga: las sé toitín úr agus thosaigh ag caint
result.orig: Las sé toitín úr agus thosaigh ag caint
result.html: las sé toitín úr agus thosaigh ag caintHe lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.
result.ponchtml: las sé toitín úr agus ṫosaiġ ag caintHe lit up a fresh cigarette and started to talk.

result.eng: I don't like speaking in public.
result.ga: ní maith liom bheith ag caint go poiblí
result.orig: Ní maith liom bheith ag caint go poiblí
result.html: ní maith liom bheith ag caint go poiblíI don't like speaking in public.
result.ponchtml: ní maiṫ liom ḃeiṫ ag caint go poiblíI don't like speaking in public.

result.eng: I didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.
result.ga: níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainte
result.orig: Níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainte
result.html: níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainteI didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.
result.ponchtml: níor ṫuig mé gaċ focal aċ ṫuig mé éirim na cainteI didn't understand every word but I understood the gist of the talk.

result.eng: We happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ga: tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.orig: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.html: tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteachWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ponchtml: ṫarla go raiḃ muid ag caint fútsa díreaċ nuair a ṫáinig tú isteaċWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.

result.eng: What you're saying seems true.
result.ga: tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainte
result.orig: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainte
result.html: tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainteWhat you're saying seems true.
result.ponchtml: tá cuma na fírinne ar do ċuid cainteWhat you're saying seems true.

result.eng: I am speaking.
result.ga: tá mé ag caint
result.orig: Tá mé ag caint
result.html: tá mé ag caintI am speaking.
result.ponchtml: tá mé ag caintI am speaking.

result.eng: Welcome back. On the programme today I am talking to Aoife Ní Loideáin.
result.ga: tá fáilte romhaibh ar ais ar an chlár inniu tá mé ag caint le aoife ní loideáin
result.orig: Tá fáilte romhaibh ar ais Ar an chlár inniu tá mé ag caint le Aoife Ní Loideáin
result.html: tá fáilte romhaibh ar ais ar an chlár inniu tá mé ag caint le aoife ní loideáinWelcome back. On the programme today I am talking to Aoife Ní Loideáin.
result.ponchtml: tá fáilte roṁaiḃ ar ais ar an ċlár inniu tá mé ag caint le aoife ní loideáinWelcome back. On the programme today I am talking to Aoife Ní Loideáin.

result.eng: We were just talking about you.
result.ga: bhí muid díreach ag caint fút
result.orig: Bhí muid díreach ag caint fút
result.html: bhí muid díreach ag caint fútWe were just talking about you.
result.ponchtml: ḃí muid díreaċ ag caint fútWe were just talking about you.

result.eng: Goodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.
result.ga: slán leat a shiobhán beidh mé ag caint leat amárach
result.orig: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárach
result.html: slán leat a shiobhán beidh mé ag caint leat amárachGoodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: slán leat a ẛioḃán beiḋ mé ag caint leat amáraċGoodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.

result.eng: She is the talk of the town.
result.ga: tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaile
result.orig: Tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaile
result.html: tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaileShe is the talk of the town.
result.ponchtml: tá sí ina ceap cainte ag an mbaileShe is the talk of the town.

result.eng: A few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ga: traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.orig: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.html: traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ponchtml: traiḋfil blianta ó ẛin ḃíoṫas ag caint ar ḃreacaḋ ré úr do na meáin ċumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.

result.eng: Be sensible and don't say such things.
result.ga: bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
result.orig: Bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eile
result.html: bíodh ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteacht eileBe sensible and don't say such things.
result.ponchtml: bíoḋ ciall agat agus fág an cineál sin cainte le rá ag duine inteaċt eileBe sensible and don't say such things.

result.eng: There'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ga: ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.orig: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.html: ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃeaḋ gar doṁsa nó duitse a ḃeiṫ ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.

result.eng: You could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ga: bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.orig: Bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leis
result.html: bhí sé chomh maith a bheith ag caint leis an ghealach le a bheith ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé ċoṁ maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag caint leis an ġealaċ le a ḃeiṫ ag caint leisYou could just as well be talking to the moon instead of talking to him.

result.eng: But what am I saying?
result.ga: ach cá bhfuil mé ag caint
result.orig: Ach cá bhfuil mé ag caint
result.html: ach cá bhfuil mé ag caintBut what am I saying?
result.ponchtml: aċ cá ḃfuil mé ag caintBut what am I saying?

result.eng: You should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ga: ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.orig: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.html: ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ponchtml: ba ċóir duit ḃeiṫ ag caint le do ṁacasaṁail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.

result.eng: He got close enough to him to talk.
result.ga: tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.orig: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.html: tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig sé fá ḟad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.

result.eng: You think it's strange for me to talk like that.
result.ga: síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidse
result.orig: Síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidse
result.html: síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a bheith iontach ag mo leithéidseYou think it's strange for me to talk like that.
result.ponchtml: síleann tú an cineál seo cainte a ḃeiṫ iontaċ ag mo leiṫéidseYou think it's strange for me to talk like that.

result.eng: There's no point saying anything.
result.ga: níl gar a bheith ag caint
result.orig: Níl gar a bheith ag caint
result.html: níl gar a bheith ag caintThere's no point saying anything.
result.ponchtml: níl gar a ḃeiṫ ag caintThere's no point saying anything.
